He has gone by many names during his long life--heretic, rebel,

- Why is my skin broken out and blotchy? And how can I cover it? -

book_title: Sword Play (Forgotten Realms:  Arcane Age series, Book 1)
Summary:

book_title: The Gully Dwarves (Dragonlance Lost Histories, Vol. 5)

Presents a close-up look at the gully dwarves, a devious and zany race

Original. 75,000 first printing.

book_title: Knights of the Rose (Dragonlance Warriors, Vol. 5)
Summary:
Sir Pirvan strives to maintain the integrity of the Knights of the

book_title: Cormyr: A Novel (Forgotten Realms)
Summary:
In an epic novel that chronicles the history of the land of Cormyr and

catastrophe as King Azoun IV falls prey to assassins and the past
holds the key to the events to come. 50,000 ...

book_title: The Mage in the Iron Mask (Forgotten Realms Novel: The Nobles)
Summary:
Mulmaster, nicknamed the "City of Danger", is the next stop
on Volothamp Geddarm's research trip for his upcoming Guide to the
Monsoon, and maybe his final resting place when the bailing out of a
friend from the Mulmaster prison embroils ...

book_title: Pages of Pain (Planescape Books)
Summary:
The Lady of Pain, vigilant defender of Sigil, keeps an ongoing memoir

book_title: The Spider's Test (Birthright)
Summary:
Ambition and destiny drive one man to confront the insane lord of the

book_title: The Dragons (Dragonlance Lost Histories, Vol. 6)
Summary: Fantasy roman.

book_title: Tangled Webs (Forgotten Realms: Starlight and Shadows, Book 2)
Summary:
The free-spirited elf priestess, Liriel Baenre, is lured from her home

book_title: Stormlight (Forgotten Realms: The Harpers)
Summary:
Stormlight Strange magic is on the loose in Firefall Keep -- magic
that kills.

book_title: Dragons of Summer Flame (Dragonlance Saga Novel: Chronicles (Books))
Summary: Fantasy roman.

Summary:

At the height of the Chaos War, two isolated groups of enemies--

all.

book_title: Planar Powers (Blood Wars Trilogy , No 3)
Summary: Aereas is dead.

book_title: Soulforge: A Novel (Dragonlance Saga)
Summary:
Chronicles the life of the dark mage, Raistlin Majere, from the time

book_title: Elminster in Myth Drannor: Forgotten Realms : Fantasy Adventure (Novel)
Summary:
Elminster, a young wizard, journeys to the elven city of Cormanthor,

book_title: The Day of the Tempest (Dragonlance Dragons of a New Age, Vol. 2)
Summary: Fantasy.

Summary:
The Chaos War Rages For fans of Dragons of Summer Flame, this is a new
short-story collection, featuring the brave heroes, dark villains,

popular fantasy worlds -- Krynn.

book_title: Mortal Consequences (Forgotten Realms:  Netheril Trilogy, Book 3)
Summary:
As the Netherese empire collapses, Sunbright the shaman strives to

book_title: Fistandantilus Reborn (Dragonlance Lost Legends, Vol. 2)
Summary:

book_title: Cormyr (Forgotten Realms:  The Cormyr Saga, Book 1)
Summary:
Against this crisis of state, the history of the Forest Kingdom

In a desperate attempt to preserve Tyche's goodness, the gods

book_title: The Lost Library of Cormanthyr (Forgotten Realms:  Lost Empires, Book 1)
Summary: The Lost Library of Cormanthyr Is it just a myth?

book_title: Tales of Uncle Trapspringer (Dragonlance)
Summary:
The most famous and legendary kender of them all finally takes (or
borrows) center stage!

book_title: The Doom Brigade (Dragonlance Kang's Regiment, Vol. 1)
Summary: Fantasy roman.

book_title: The Paladins (The Double Diamond Triangle Saga , No 2)

The "Double Diamond Triangle Saga" continues! Lord
Piergeiron has fallen ill, but his loyal retainers prepare to rescue

book_title: Thornhold (Harpers , No 16)

Summary:

Driven to find a way past his own flesh, into a soul torn between

book_title: Tears of the Night Sky (Dragonlance Chaos Wars, Vol. 2)

book_title: The Temptation of Elminster (Forgotten Realms)
Summary:
As the elven city of Myth Drannor lies in ruin, Elminster, the wizard,

book_title: Rising Tide (Forgotten Realms:  The Threat from the Sea, Book 1)

This novel shares a setting with the "Sea of Fallen Stars"

book_title: The Soulforge (Dragonlance:  The Raistlin Chronicles, Book 1)

book_title: Storm at Eldala (Star Drive Harbinger Trilogy, Vol 2)

When the sale of dream spheres threatens the life of Danilo

Summary:
Vheod Runechild -- half human, half fiend -- flees from the Abyss to

book_title: Heroes and Fools (Dragonlance Tales of the Fifth Age, Vol. 2)
Evermeet: Island of Elves (Forgotten Realms)
Summary:
Amlaruil, Queen of All Elves, defends the island of Evermeet from
attack.

book_title: Starfall (Star Drive (Novels))
Summary:
A collection of short stories revealing TSR's new and exciting
setting.

book_title: Zero Point (Star Drive (Novels))

book_title: Under Fallen Stars (Forgotten Realms:  The Threat from the Sea, Book 2)

book_title: Against the Giants (Greyhawk)
Summary:
Emerson is known for her popular "Xena: Warrior Princess"

He must take Mt. Nevermind. Fergus Ryan tells the amazing story of the

book_title: Pool of Radiance: The Ruins of Myth Drannor (Forgotten Realms)

book_title: The Silent Blade (Forgotten Realms:  Paths of Darkness, Book 1)

book_title: The Spine of the World (Forgotten Realms Series)

book_title: White Plume Mountain (Greyhawk)

book_title: Magic the Gathering: Prophecy

02 Who killed Ambassador Bloodarrow? When the Lord of Tarsis finds

book_title: In Fluid Silence (Dark Matter, Book 3)
Summary:
Seeking their partner, who has mysteriously vanished, two agents from

book_title: The Scorpion (Legend of the Five Rings:  Clan War, First Scroll)

A guide for the popular collectible card game includes rule

book_title: Dragons of a Fallen Sun (Dragonlance: The War of Souls, Volume I)
Summary:
In the epic conclusion of the War of Souls trilogy, a courageous band

villainous and her powerful army of the dead, in a dramatic climax

book_title: Downfall (Dragonlance:  The Dhamon Saga, Book 1)

book_title: Forgotten Realms Campaign Setting (Dungeons & Dragons)

Everything a player needs to adventure in the Forgotten Realms, the

economics, societies, organizations, religions, politics ...

book_title: Enemies and Allies (Dungeons & Dragons Accessory)

book_title: Dragon's Bluff (Dragonlance:  Crossroads, Book 3)

The port town of Flotsam, always left to handle its own problems,

In the fifth novel of the seven-book series, the Crab Clan has

Original. The War of Souls casts a long shadow over the world of

Revisiting classic adventures has been extremely successful.Queen of

" -- "The New York Times. "This classic tale of love

book_title: I Am a Cat

book_title: Living in Japan: A Guide to Living, Working, and Traveling in Japan
Summary:
This guidebook to Japan is a great way to gain understanding of how to

book_title: Origami: Japanese Paper Folding
Summary:
A great introductory book to the wonderful Japanese art of paper-

book_title: Tales of a Chinese Grandmother

book_title: Traditions: Essays on the Japanese Martial Arts and Ways (Tuttle Martial Arts)
Summary:

book_title: Zen in Ten: Easy Lessons for Spiritual Growth (Ten Easy Lessons Series, 2)
Summary:

book_title: Romance of the Three Kingdoms, Vol. 2

book_title: Adventures of Huckleberry Finn
Summary:
The tale of two outcasts' journey down the Mississippi River,

Twain knew intimately, and the moving story of a boy who must make his
own way in an often cruel society that ...

book_title: Scarlet Letter
Summary:
Set in the harsh Puritan community of 17th century Massachusetts, this

book_title: Swiss Family Robinson
Summary: Reading Level 6-8Interest Level 6-12

book_title: Moby Dick
Summary:
A young seaman joins the crew of the whaling ship Pequod, led by the

book_title: The Jungle
Ambassadors (Airmont)
Summary:
This complex tale of self-discovery -- considered by the author to be

Strether.

book_title: Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
Summary:
A collection of twelve baffling cases, which Sherlock Holmes solves,

book_title: Adventures of Pinocchio
Summary:
Pinocchio, a wooden puppet full of tricks and mischief, with a talent

book_title: Marble Faun
Summary:
Murder and romance, innocence and experience dominate this sinister

book_title: In the Days of the Comet
Summary:
Revenge was all Leadford could think of as he set out to find the

book_title: Man Without a Country and Other Stories

children of the public," and "The last voyage of the

book_title: They Shoot Canoes, Don't They?

book_title: Boober Fraggle's Giant Wish

book_title: Death of a Party Animal (A Doonesbury book)

book_title: The Grasshopper Trap
Summary:
The bestselling author of They Shoot Canoes, Don't They? is at it

book_title: The Discovery of King Arthur

Summary:
This essential guide to writing for the screen goes step-by-step

book_title: Six Letter Word for Death (Rinehart Suspense Novel)
Summary:
A crossword puzzle compiled by a mischievous group of mystery writers

receives an anonymous crossword ...

book_title: Anti-Coloring Book
Summary:
Praised as "extraordinary, revolutionary" (Newsweek),

"great stuff" (Detroit Free Press), this innovative series

years.

book_title: Bad Habits: A 100% Fact-Free Book

book_title: Outlaws
Summary:
A police detective and assistant district attorney pursue the

book_title: Cow-Tail Switch and Other West African Stories

book_title: Anansi the Spider: A Tale from the Ashanti (An Owlet Book)

book_title: Sam, Bangs, and Moonshine (Owlet Book)

book_title: Biko: The Book Behind Richard Attenborough's Cry Freedom

book_title: E Is for Evidence: A Kinsey Millhone Mystery (Grafton, Sue. Kinsey Millhone Mysteries.)

Seventeen years after the murder of Jean Timberlake at Floral Beach,

book_title: Beni's First Chanukah

book_title: Naked and the Dead

book_title: We Wish You a Merry Christmas

Is for Corpse "D" Is for Deadbeat "E" Is for

"L" is for Lawless "M" Is for ...

book_title: Anti-Memoirs/207011
Summary: BIOGRAPHY/AUTOBIOGRAPHY

book_title: Vest Pocket Italian

Summary:
During one extraordinary day, three women-grandmother Rachel--facing

Summary:
Here is a nuts-and-bolts, hands-on approach for the practical and

book_title: It Happened in America: True Stories from the Fifty States

Summary:
This is the lavishly illustrated, definitive account of The Phantom of

Children see a variety of animals, each one a different color, and a

Seven-year-old Cory Coleman's birthday party is ruined by the

book_title: Streetlethal

The Girl Who Heard Dragons is a fresh revelation of the wealth and

reader and collector of all she has published.

book_title: Free Flows the River
Summary:
In this continuation of the High Freedom saga, the son of mountain man

book_title: Destiny's Road

On Planet Destiny, Jemmy Blocher kills a laborer and flees for his

The Chronicler of Lormt recounts the epic tales of two brave women and

A runaway on the streets of San Francisco meets an exiled clan from

book_title: Mindsword's Story (6th Book of Lost Swords)
Summary:
When the long-lost Mindsword--which gives mindless devotion to the one

book_title: Moon Dance

Set against a brilliant panorama of European expansion into the West

Summary:
Twenty-five years after the great war between the inner planets and

The nuclear war against China and India has left America victorious,

The prophecy of Mouvar unfolds throughout the alternate realities

Two serial killers stalk the cops of Chicago, one of them decapitating

Sixty-seven centuries in the future, a bureaucratic snafu makes

book_title: Ripley's Believe It or Not! Strange Coincidences

book_title: Conjure Wife/Our Lady of Darkness (2 Books in One)

book_title: The Eagle and the Raven
Summary:
In a story set against the backdrop of one of the most exciting

revolution of 1836, which resulted in the ...

When Kelvin was a child, his mother read to him from the Book of

While the decadent Emperor Vildiz and his corrupt allies plot the

While the Emperor of the Hundred Worlds guides a massive project that

Mother Goose and Grimm has grown in syndication at a rate that is

Summary:
After a spaceship crashes in unknown and unfriendly territory, two

place quickly before the clock runs ...

Summary:
Karen Newman is a savvy business executive whose sole experience with

Summary:
These six classic Anderson stories involve interplanetary or

The arrival of Amanda Walker, a talented young artist, in the

Staying in a dilapidated old Florida mansion, Brian Gerard a teacher,

Six hundred years ago on the Chesapeake Bay, the unprovoked and brutal

book_title: End Game (End Game)
Summary:
The letters are carved into the foreheads of dead bodies found on the

Summary:
Bleys Ahrens is now a political power on the planet Association, home

Summary:
Barbara is determined to protect her husband, Jamie Melford, from the

Summary:
On the run from his ex-girlfriend, entertainment czar Willie Hanson

well

book_title: Spiritwalk (Tor Fantasy)

Summary:
One of the reigning masters of SF today presents a futuristic

Suspenseful stories portray supernatural events in a variety of

Four young friends, troubled by personal problems, find their wishes

Summary:
A collection of noted horror stories by a host of distinguished

Summary:
Years after an inexplicable incident during which ninety percent of

Jesse Sikes, a horrible beast with a taste for human flesh who is able

Summary:
With a massive comet bearing down on earth, the citizens of earth run

book_title: Playgrounds of the Mind
Summary:
"-Locus "Niven's most representative work.... Highly

book_title: The Great Hunt (The Wheel of Time, Book 2)

Darren Lemke will also executive produce, with Jordan’s widow Harriet
McDougal serving as consulting producer." —Variety The Wheel of

#3 The Dragon Reborn #4 The ...

book_title: Nightfall
Summary:
Scarred emotionally and physically, Anita flees to the sanctuary of

Summary:

book_title: Lovelock (The Mayflower Trilogy, Book 1)

A pornographic tape sent anonymously, a menacing figure, vandalism,

Ten years after her brutal rape, Kara Cleveland's life has finally

Winter storms are white and grey--except in Oxrun Station, where the

Summary:
When the brain-dead begin rising from their hospital beds and children

Summary:
Then the Siren began to sing, and it was the last sound the man would

Summary:
The spirit of a young pianist murdered forty years before by William

book_title: Sandman
Summary: FICTION-SUSPENSE/PSYCHOLOGICAL

book_title: Night Games
Summary:
To forget her parents' double suicide, Zoe Manning returns to her

book_title: The Color of Evil (The Dark Descent, Vol. 1)

book_title: Enders Game (Ender Wiggins Saga (Paperback))

book_title: The River's Daughter

When Larissa Demming, a seemingly happily married woman, encounters

Summary:
But appearances can be deceiving--and Christine may have everything to
fear from the woman next door.

Summary:
The mysterious and seductive hero Ragoczy Saint-Germain is torn

Summary:
Young Faris Nallaneen, the Duchess of Galazon, has been sent to a far-

Summary:
Firestar is a chronicle of private enterprise and individual

book_title: The Empire of Ice
Summary:
In the year 2000, an active volcano emerges from the Mid-Atlantic

Summary:
When a tremendous volcanic explosion spells eternal winter for the

Summary:

book_title: The Ring of Charon (The Hunted Earth, Book 1)
Summary:
The first book in the Hunted Earth series, published to tie in with

book_title: Shortgrass Song
Summary:
An epic saga follows the life of Texan Caleb Holcomb, who comes of age

book_title: Spear of Heaven
Summary: The sequel to Arrows of the Sun.

book_title: Cat in a Golden Garland : A Midnight Louie Mystery (A Midnight Louie Mystery)
Summary:
Las Vegas' feline supersleuth and his redheaded owner go on the
prowl when a Madison Avenue ad agency's chief executive forgoes
his traditional Santa suit for a company party and instead hires an
actor, who somehow turns up dead, and the ...

book_title: The Blood of Ten Chiefs (Elfquest, Vol 1)
Summary:
Gathers stories set on the World of Two Moons by Piers Anthony, Robert

book_title: Space Wars

In a future time, when incessant human violence has used up the

book_title: Alien Plot
Summary:
This brand-new story leads off a collection of sixteen tales by Piers

paperback!

book_title: Tales of the Flying Mountains
Summary:
Leaving behind the conflicts between Earth's inhabitants and the

Summary:
An agent of the Time Patrol tries to defeat the plot of a mysterious

Time travel stories deal with colonies in the past, a future slave

book_title: The Unicorn Trade

Science fiction stories portray encounters with alien beings, a Greek

Summary:
The pig Plantagenet cannot decide whether he likes the free but

Summary:
Discovering he is one of only two existing purebred Caucasians being

Summary:
The estate was Joshua Pinson's inheritance from his oddball uncle

When the U.S. vice president's daughter is kidnapped and sold in

book_title: Pretender
Summary:
Science fiction adventure from the creator of the New York Times

book_title: Hasan
Summary:
In the days of Sinbad, the handsome young merchant Hasan quests forth

book_title: Anthonology
Summary:
A retrospective anthology of tales is highlighted by autobiographical

book_title: Prostho Plus
Summary: What's keeping you from your grand tour of the universe?

book_title: Steppe
Summary:
A warrior chieftain battles a decadent galactic empire in a strange

book_title: Sibs
Summary:
Kara Wald is shocked when the sister she knows as down-to-earth, even

Summary:
Beyond this universe, the crew of Starship Meg II find only ghosts,

After a complicated truce is worked out between Earth and the planet

book_title: The Boat of a Million Years
Summary:
A milestone in modern science fiction, a New York Times Notable Book

Aubrey Knight, a twenty-first-century assassin-turned-crusader, dons

Summary:
Orion finds himself thrust back to the ancient world of Greece and

Hegira is a huge, unmapped planet, home to hundreds of tribes and

book_title: Psychlone
Summary:
However, he can't stop asking questions--questions that will bring
him face to face with psychlone!

book_title: Eon
Summary:
The 21st century was on the brink of nuclear confrontation when the
300 kilometer-long stone flashed out of nothingness and into
Earth's orbit.

book_title: Beyond Heaven's River
Summary:
The science fiction classic from the Nebula Award-winning author of
"Darwin'sRadio" returns in this newly repackaged
edition.com.

book_title: In Alien Flesh
Summary:
This collection of science fiction stories by the Hugo Award-winning
author includes the classic title story as well as "White
Creatures," "Doing Lennon," and "To The Storming
Gulf;" by the author of "Artifact,"
"Timescape," and "Against ...

book_title: Artifact
Summary:
The discovery of a mysterious artifact in an ancient Greek tomb--an
object concealing both the secret of Atlantis and an unimaginable
power--leads Americans John and Claire into confrontation with Greek
revolutionaries and the U.S. Secret ...

book_title: Her Pilgrim Soul
Summary:
Imaginative, magical stories delve into the lives of such characters

book_title: Ancient of Days
Summary: Science fiction-roman.

book_title: Out of the Sun
Summary:
A scientist-detective's mission is to investigate the unexplained

book_title: Escape Plus
Summary:
Finding himself in yet another prison--a new juvenile health center--

book_title: Gremlins Go Home
Summary:
Baneen devises a plan so that he and his fellow gremlins can leave

book_title: Privateers
Summary: America Has Ceded The Heavens To The Tyrants -- And The Renegades.

book_title: The Winds of Altair
Summary:
Earth is an old planet, and her teeming masses are running out of
resources . . . and time.

book_title: Orbital Resonance
Summary:
Adolescence on an asteroid has Melpomene torn between the desires in

book_title: Orion : A Novel (Orion)
Summary:
Eternal warrior John O'Ryan challenges the Dark Lord's
dominion over the earth in a battle for control of the future.
Reissue.

book_title: Enders Game
Summary: Once again, Earth is under attack.

book_title: The Memory of Earth (Homecoming (Paperback))
Summary:
The first volume in the Homecoming saga from bestselling author Orson
Scott Card, The Memory of Earth High above the planet Harmony, the
Oversoul watches.

book_title: The Call of Earth
Summary:
As Harmony's Oversoul grows weaker, a great warrior has arisen to
challenge its bans.

book_title: Terry Carr's Best Science Fiction of the Year, No 14, 1984
Summary:
This fourteenth annual "Best of the Year" collection
includes John Varley's "Press Enter," Octavia E.
Butler's "Bloodchild," Pamela Sargent's

Michael Swanwick's "Trojan Horse"

book_title: Downtiming the Night Side
Summary: Science fiction-roman.

book_title: Earthborn (Homecoming (Paperback))
Summary: High above the earth orbits the starship Basilica.

book_title: Seventh Son (Tales of Alvin Maker, Book 1)
Summary:
A tribute to the art of storytelling, this is highly
recommended." —Library Journal "This beguiling book recalls
Robert Penn Warren in its robust blend of folktale, history, parable,
personal testimony, and pioneer narrative." ...

book_title: Labyrinth of Dreams (Labyrinth of Dreams G. O. D. Inc.)
Summary:
P.I. team Sam and Brandy Horowitz follow the trail of a banker who

book_title: Spirits of Flux and Anchor (Soul Rider Series, Book 1)
Summary:
Cassie and her friends on Anchor Logh face being declared surplus in

book_title: Rapture Effect
Summary:
The tale of an interstellar war conducted entirely by an Artitifical

book_title: Infinity Link
Summary:
Kadin, an artificial personality, is sent on board a spacecraft as an

book_title: The Turn of the Screw
Summary:
The classic ghost story about a high-strung governess and the two

Peter Quint

book_title: Hans Brinker or the Silver Skates : Complete and Unabridged (Tor Classics)
Summary:
From glistening ice roads to frozen canals, in a wonderland where even

awaiting the fabulous race to win the magnificent Silver Skates --
Except Hans Brinker and his ...

Summary:
When good guys go bad and bad guys go legit, only today's most

Summary:
In the mid-Pacific, a gigantic hurricane triggered by nuclear

book_title: Hart's Hope
Summary:
It was for mercy's sake that Palicroval the Fair left Hart to live

book_title: Seventh Son (Tales of Alvin Maker (Paperback))
Summary:
Blending folklore and myth, this novel follows young Alvin Maker as he

book_title: Ender's Game (Ender Wiggins Saga (Paperback))
Summary:
The Hugo and Nebula Award-winning classic is now available in an
author's definitive edition.

This two-in-one package features a story of a space disaster
victim's meeting with the actual Medusa and an evocation of
mountain climbing on Mars

book_title: The Changed Man (Changed Man)

Eleven stories of dread, introductions and afterwords from "Maps

The history of humankind is recreated through the experiences of

Summary:
Hunting an evil species that preys upon unsuspecting highway drivers,

Summary:
Adrift in a world torn by sorcery gone wild, the Company is the last

Summary:

legions of the dead

book_title: Shadow Games : The Fourth Chronicles of the Black Company: First Book of the South (Chronicles of The Black Company)
Summary: Fantasy.

A child, a nameless outcast condemned to death, is born, a boy who is

he loves

The Outcast waits in a Castle outside of Time, his soul imprisoned in

book_title: Nemesis (Indigo, Book 1)
Summary:
Princess Anghara's insatiable curiosity about the Tower of
Regrets, a place forbidden to her, unleashes an army of evil on the

Summary:
The fourth tale in the saga of Recluse finds a young wizard at the
center of a battle between good and evil, where he faces a destiny in

book_title: The Magic Engineer (Recluce series, Book 3)
Summary: Return now to the world of Recluce in The Magic Engineer.

book_title: The Ivory and the Horn (Newford)
Summary:
Set in the fantastic city of Newford, locale of Memory & Dream, a

book_title: Svaha
Summary:
Out beyond the Enclaves, in the desolation between the cities, an

book_title: The Lord of Castle Black (The Viscount of Adrilankha, Book 2)
Summary:
The Dragonlord Moorlan encounters such challenges as swordplay,
quests, romance, and a missing heir to the Imperial Throne.

book_title: Calde of the Long Sun (Book of the Long Sun, Vol 3)
Summary:
Young Silk, inspired by the gods, fights for survival against the

book_title: World Without End

In a new version of the myth of Atlantis, the lost continent is home

book_title: As the Wolf Loves Winter
Summary: It is snowing in the wintry mountains of northwestern Pennsylvania.

book_title: Day of the Delphi
Summary:
With charismatic billionaire Samuel Jackson Dodd at its head, a

Summary:
Who is responsible? A cabal of power-seeking corporations? Rogue

book_title: Speak Daggers to Her: A Bast Mystery
Summary:
"Bast" (alias Karen Hightower) is a single white witch,

book_title: Eternity's End
Summary:
After escaping a pirate stronghold, star rigger Renwald Legroeder and

book_title: Panglor
Summary:
Richard Jordan is a telepath, but his psychic gifts have brought him

book_title: Saturn Rukh
Summary:
In the near future five intrepid men and women have been paid a

book_title: The Eyes of Kid Midas

book_title: Dissidents
Summary:
Moving to Moscow from Chicago isn't easy, especially if your
mother is the US Ambassador.

book_title: The Last Trail (Ohio Frontier)
Summary:
When a woman is kidnapped from Fort Henry by a band of renegades and

book_title: The Yngling
Summary:
From the Scandinavian forests, where a new ice age is beginning, comes

book_title: Demons Don't Dream (Xanth)
Summary:
Two young adventurers are drawn into the world of Xanth through a
computer game and find themselves in a desperate race against time
when treachery, danger, and deceit place Xanth itself in peril, as
they learn that some things are more ...

book_title: Harpy Thyme (Xanth)
Summary:
Gloha, the beautiful offspring of a harpy and a goblin, who represents
the only creature of her kind on the world of Xanth, searches for the
Good Magician Humfrey, hoping to learn how a unique being can find
true love

book_title: Geis of the Gargoyle (Xanth)
Summary:
Seeking a spell that will restore the polluted river Swan Knee to a
state of purity, guardian Gary Gargoyle finds himself face-to-face

book_title: Roc and a Hard Place
Summary:
In the land of Xanth, Roxanne Roc, a bird, must stand trial before

book_title: The Gathering Flame: The Prequel to Mageworlds (Mageworlds, No 4)
Summary:
When the Magelords begin to plunder the civilized galaxy, effortlessly

Summary:
More than twenty years after the end of the Second Magewar, power

Summary:

Summary:

Summary:

book_title: Planet of the Damned
Summary:
As two planets that share a single star prepare to go to war, Brion

book_title: The Tree People
Summary:
Drawing on the ancient lore and rituals of her people in order to

book_title: Orion Among the Stars
Summary:
More than human and less that a god, John O'Ryan is Orion, made by

book_title: The Voices of Heaven
Summary:
Barry di Hoa had the good life on the Moon: steady work and the love

book_title: The Other End of Time (Eschaton Sequence)
Summary:
In the year 2031, the earth receives its first message from outer

book_title: Stainless Steel Visions
Summary:
Features fourteen of the author's short stories, including a new

book_title: Death Fires
Summary:
A low-budget film shoot on the coast of Mexico becomes the scene of a
life-and-death struggle among a ruthlessly manipulative director, a
beautiful and frightened actress, and a cinematographer skeptical of

book_title: Murdock's Law
Summary:
When Deputy United States Marshall Murdock tries to arrest a
gunfighter hired by a rancher, he gets caught in the middle of a fight
for control of the town

book_title: Spacepaw
Summary:
A sudden change of orders sends terraforming engineer Bill Waltham to
the backwater planet Dilbia to teach the bearlike natives the basics

book_title: Space Winners
Summary:
A science fiction story of the exploits of three young people as they
face the destruction of an alien planet

book_title: On the Run
Summary:
After the police order him to forget his missing wife, Kil
Bruner's search leads him to deformed psychos, secret societies of

book_title: Stranger
The Space Swimmers
Summary:
Land-born humans are forced to overcome their hatred of the sea-born
so that the sea-born can learn the secret of space flight from the

book_title: Probe
Summary:
Here is a special re-release of Probe, the bestselling saga of a young
alien woman sent to Earth with a mission and her befriended
psychiatrist who seeks to help this mysterious, lost creature.

book_title: Keepers of Edanvant
Summary:
With her human companion, Kendric, silver-eyed Irissa finds her home

book_title: The Three Musketeers
Summary:
Records the heroic deeds of Athos, Porthos, Aramis, and d'Artagnan

book_title: Songs of Earth & Power: The Infinity Concerto and the Serpent Mage
Summary:
The Song of Power opened the gateway to the Realm of the Sidhe,

book_title: Fortress (Tom Kelly)
Summary:
Tom Kelly, a former CIA agent, is sent to infiltrate the Kurdish
contras, in order to learn about the alien being whose body, along

book_title: Bloodwars (Necroscope: Vampire World Trilogy)
Summary:
Nathan must summon the living and the dead to end his rivalry with his

book_title: Mysteries of Strange Appearances from Beyond (Strange Unsolved Mysteries)
Summary:
A collection of more than twenty stories recounts the appearances of

book_title: Mysteries of the Mind and the Senses (Strange Unsolved Mysteries, No 8)
Summary:
Whether you believe in psychic premonitions or not, Mysteries of the

book_title: A Deepness in the Sky : A Novel (Zones of Thought)
Summary:
A Deepness in the Sky is a 1999 Nebula Award Nominee for Best Novel
and the winner of the 2000 Hugo Award for Best Novel.

book_title: The Unicorn War
Summary:
Young magician Jarrod Courtak and his sometimes unwilling companion,
Marianna of Gwyndryth, are assisted by a legendary family of unicorns
as they attempt to save the world of Strand and change the course of
history. Reprint. LJ. VY.

book_title: One King's Way (Hammer and the Cross (Paperback))
Summary:
The king of the Vikings and conqueror of Europe, Shef is pursued by

book_title: King and Emperor (Hammer and the Cross, No 3)
Summary:
The conclusion of the critically acclaimed Hammer and the Cross
trilogy follows the Viking warrior Shef to the East in search of
wisdom, a quest that leads him to the Holy Grail. Reprint.

book_title: Wizard in Bedlam (Tor Fantasy)
Summary:
The wizard DeCade died generations ago, leading the last great revolt

masters.

book_title: A Wizard in Mind (Chronicles of the Rogue Wizard)
Summary:
Magnus D'Armand, the renegade son of Rad Gallowglass, Warlock of
Gramarye, has set out to prove himself twice the hero his father was.

book_title: A Wizard in War (Chronicles of the Rogue Wizard)
Summary:
The medieval planet of Maltroit seems to be repeating Earth's
bloody history, and it is up to the Rogue Wizard, Magnus D'Armand,
the renegade son of Rod Gallowglass, to teach the nobles a lesson in
democracy and to school the peasants in ...

book_title: Burning Down the House
Summary:
Proudly standing by her husband as he interrupts their life to write a
best-selling novel, graduate student Toby Dodge is disenchanted when

book_title: Thin Moon and Cold Mist : Women of the West (Women of the West Series)
Summary:
A spy for the Confederacy during the war, Robin Walkingstick

Summary:
Gordon Sunday, an unemployed ex-football player, enters a strange
fantasy world where he must help the Lady Glorian, her brother, Tag,

book_title: Web of Defeat
Summary:
Gideon Sunday is faced with the possibility of being stranded in the
land of Chey, unless he can fight his way through demons, witches, and

book_title: Seven Spears of the W'Dch'Ck
Summary:
Longing to fight to preserve truth and justice, Jerico Dove embarks
